Chemist.name: 化学家
Chemist.description:
作为一名研究有素的科学家，化学家们的前沿研究使他们可以用炼金爆炸，毁灭性的气体和其他可怕的化合物威慑他们的敌人。化学家们钟情于在战场上测试他们的新化合物，并热衷于进一步推进他们的研究和发现，寻求新的化学组合来使他们的敌人燃烧。

化学家法术

化学家等级法术
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5SuJewoa1CRWaj1F], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.etgcR9wqmrhyZ0tx]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FjYE214HTERCRZNm]
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TwlD4PLcltv7Xh7j]
7th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6]
9th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LkvI11Uue774QBKZ], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]

advancement.title: 化合物：戏法
advancement.hint: 你学会法师法术列表中额外一个你所选的塑能学派戏法。这些法术视为你的药剂师法术，并且它们不计入你的已知戏法。

Greater Formula.name: 大公式
Greater Formula.description:
第 11 级起，你发现了一种名为大公式的魔法秘密。从药剂师法术列表中选择一个 6 环法术作为此公式。

你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展一次你的大公式。你必须在完成一次长休之后才能再次这样做。

在更高等级，你获得更多能被你选择，并以此法施展的药剂师法术：13 级获得一个 7 环法术，15 级获得一个 8 环法术，17 级获得一个 9 环法术。你能在 19 级习得额外一个 6 环法术，并在 20 级习得额外一个 7 环法术。

当你完成一次长休后，你恢复所有使用次数。

主宰重组 当你完成一次长休并查阅了你的公式书时，你可以用药剂师法术列表中的另一个相同环阶法术，替换你以此特性获得的一个法术。

Psionic Power: Prescribed Effects.name: 心能力量：既定影响Prescribed Effects
Psionic Power: Prescribed Effects.description: 每回合一次，当 30 尺范围内你能看见的一个生物成功通过了对抗你施展的法术的智力、感知或魅力豁免检定时，你可以消耗一个心灵点将混乱的灵能量填满它的心灵，强迫目标查询掷骰 d20 并选用较低的豁免结果，这有可能使豁免的成功转变为失败。

utility.condition: 当 30 尺范围内你能看见的一个生物成功通过了对抗你施展的法术的智力、感知或魅力豁免检定时

Esoteric Theory: Noxious Blood.name: 隐秘理论：恶毒血液Noxious Blood
Esoteric Theory: Noxious Blood.description: 当一个生物在你身边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中你时，它会受到 1d6 + 你体质调整值的毒素伤害。

damage.condition: 当一个生物在你身边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中你时

Self-Diagnosis.name: 自我诊断
Self-Diagnosis.description:
如果你没有剩余的心灵点了，你可以用一个附赠动作消耗一个法术位，获得1d4个心灵点。

你还额外获得两种心灵能力：

  • 精密检查。 每当你施展为一个生物恢复生命值的法术时，你可以消耗一个心灵点。如果你这样做，该法术的所有目标都额外恢复等同于你智力调整值两倍的生命值。

  • 小脑强化。 当你施展任何来自精神师法术特性的一环及更高环阶法术时，你可以如常消耗法术位释放它，或消耗数值等同于其法术环阶的心灵点。

Psionic Power: Careful Examination.name: 心能力量：精密检查Careful Examination
Psionic Power: Careful Examination.condition: 每当你施展为一个生物恢复生命值的法术时

Psionic Power: Enhanced Cerebellum.name: 心能力量：小脑强化Enhanced Cerebellum

Spiritual Study.name: 灵魂研究
Spiritual Study.description: 你获得重甲和宗教技能的熟练项。如果你已经有了此技能的熟练，你获得你任选的一个其他技能的熟练项。你可以使用一枚圣徽作为你施展药剂师法术的法器，同时你从牧师法术列表中习得一个任选的戏法。这个戏法视为你的药剂师戏法。

Plague Proficiency.name: 瘟疫熟练Plague Proficiency
Plague Proficiency.description: 你习得戏法 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.vrN18tbTw7io5MWd] 。你获得草药工具的熟练项。如果你已经有这个熟练了，则你获得其他任选的一项工匠工具的熟练项。

Esoteric Theory: Extracurricular Researc.name: 隐秘理论：课外研究Extracurricular Research
Esoteric Theory: Extracurricular Researc.description: 你从任意职业的法术列表中选择两个戏法并额外地习得它们。这些戏法成为你的药剂师戏法。

Sitting Duck.name: 视若羔羊
Sitting Duck.description: 每个你的回合内一次，当你以远程武器攻击命中一个上回合没有进行移动的生物时，这次攻击自动变为重击。

Esoteric Theory: Triage.name: 隐秘理论：伤患鉴别法Triage
Esoteric Theory: Triage.description: 你习得戏法@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8zT7njvqbpXs4Cel] 如果你还没有习得它的话。当你施展它时，其施法距离变为60尺。

Esoteric Theory: Unfailing Focus.name: 隐秘理论：全神贯注Unfailing Focus
Esoteric Theory: Unfailing Focus.description: 当你未能通过一次体质豁免来维持你的一个药剂师法术专注时，你可以选择将其改为成功。一旦你使用过该特性，你不能再次使用它直到完成一次短休或长休。

utility.condition: 当你未能通过一次体质豁免来维持你的一个药剂师法术专注时

I Can't Stop The Monster I Created.name: 我没法让它停下来
I Can't Stop The Monster I Created.description:
你的尸锻生物的体型增加至巨型，它获得10尺触及，并且它的速度提升至50尺。它的猛击额外造成1d8点钝击伤害。

除此之外，你的尸锻生物能推、拉或举起的重量增加一倍。

Reshaped Form: Gelatin Bones.name: 血肉改造:胶制骨骼Gelatin Bones
Reshaped Form: Gelatin Bones.description: 如果你愿意，你可以像泥怪一样变得形体不定。你能够轻松穿过最窄1寸宽的狭窄空间而不用挤进去，并且你在潜行检定上具有优势。

Reshaped Form: Aquatic Attributes.name: 血肉改造:水下适应Aquatic Attributes
Reshaped Form: Aquatic Attributes.description: 你长出了鳃，你的皮肤变得黏糊糊，并且你的手指和脚趾之间长出了蹼。当你执行此选项时，你可以在水下呼吸，并且你获得等于你步行速度的游泳速度。

Reshaped Form: Aquatic Attributes.name: 血肉改造:水下适应Aquatic Attributes

Esoteric Theory: Medical Expertise.name: 隐秘理论：妙手回春Medical Expertise
Esoteric Theory: Medical Expertise.description: 你获得医药和自然技能的熟练。你以这些技能进行任何属性检定时获得双倍的熟练加值。

Esoteric Theory: Medical Expertise.name: 隐秘理论：妙手回春Medical Expertise
Esoteric Theory: Medical Expertise.description: 你获得医药和自然技能的熟练。你以这些技能进行任何属性检定时获得双倍的熟练加值。

Consume Corruption.name: 吞噬腐化Consume Corruption
Consume Corruption.description: 你获得施展@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.RCZRkk5mU0PoswsG] 的能力。你每天施展该法术的次数等同于你的熟练加值。以这种方式施展法术时，你无需材料成分。你不能对自己使用此能力。

Blighted Magic: Purify Spell.name: 枯败法术：净化法术Purify Spell
Blighted Magic: Purify Spell.description: 当你施展一个受污染法术时，你可以消耗一次荒野变形特性使用次数来在不获得污染等级的情况下施展它。

utility.condition: 当你施展一个受污染法术

Big Meaty Fist.name: 大肉拳
Big Meaty Fist.description:
仅变形灵药生效时可用

的每一个手掌变为一个大肉拳，你可以以之施展近战武器攻击。它被你视为简易武器。你的大肉拳命中时，造成1d10+你的力量调整值+你的药剂师等级的钝击伤害。

自六级起，你的大肉拳攻击视为魔法攻击，以克服对非魔法攻击和伤害的抗性和免疫。

Occult Practices.name: 玄奥实践 Occult Practices
Occult Practices.description:
第1级起，你选择习得一门玄奥实践，这门选定的学科表现了你对自身肉体和精神的持续研究：精神师，化学家，驱邪师，突变者，病原师，掘坟人。

你的选择在1级赋予了你额外的熟练项和一个扩展法术列表，并在3级、6级、10级、14级和18级提供了额外的职业特性。

玄奥实践：

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.LJn6blcn7U3WZM0f]

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.066tdj7Ot5Sf9Xj2]

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.JGquN35T5lVUy5EH]

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.f9mSl94Qzz5xjeGF]

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.iBeOFPdnKuZESA43]

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.eUqv8wW7ar9CuQXh]

Blighted Magic.name: 枯败法术
Blighted Magic.description:
你的魔法变为对德鲁伊信条的扭曲嘲弄，而你也能根据需要扭曲自己的法术。你召唤生物或自然动植物的法术看起来病态，充满血肉触须，而召来的动物则充满变异和病症。此外，当你施展一个法术时，你可以选择以下一个枯败魔法选项：

  • 孪生法术Twin Spell 如果你施展的法术施展一个影响单一生物，且施法距离并非自身时，你可以消耗一次你的荒野变形特性使用次数，并在法术施法距离内再指定另一个目标。
  • 瞬发法术Quicken Spell 当你施展一个施法时间为1动作的法术时，你可以消耗一次你的荒野变形特性使用次数将其施法时间改为1附赠动作。
  • 腐化法术Corrupt Spell 当你为法术进行伤害掷骰时，你可以使用一次荒野变形特性使用次数，将法术的伤害类型变为黯蚀。此外，你可以重掷其中一定数量的骰子。重掷骰子的最大数等于你的感知调整值（至少为1），且你必须接受新的结果。
  • 净化法术 Purify Spell 当你施展一个受污染法术（见第四章）时，你可以消耗一次荒野变形特性使用次数来在不获得污染等级的情况下施展它。

Blighted Magic: Twin Spell.name: 枯败法术：孪生法术Twin Spell
Blighted Magic: Twin Spell.condition: 如果你施展的法术施展一个影响单一生物，且施法距离并非自身时

Blighted Magic: Quicken Spell.name: 枯败法术：瞬发法术Quicken Spell
Blighted Magic: Quicken Spell.condition: 当你施展一个施法时间为1动作的法术时

Blighted Magic: Corrupt Spell.name: 枯败法术：腐化法术Corrupt Spell
Blighted Magic: Corrupt Spell.condition: 当你为法术进行伤害掷骰时

Blighted Magic: Purify Spell.name: 枯败法术：净化法术Purify Spell
Blighted Magic: Purify Spell.condition: 当你施展一个受污染法术时

Pernicious Pathogens.name: 恶性病原Pernicious Pathogens
Pernicious Pathogens.description: 当一个生物施展一个法术或使用一种特性或能力来治愈或移除你的一种疾病（例如施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV] 来移除你的@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.yv8R1NwzoZ6UJEsJ]），该生物必须先使用它的施法属性进行一次属性检定（或它的魅力调整值，如果该咒语或特殊能力并未指定一个法术调整值时）。其DC等同于你的法术豁免DC。若检定失败，该生物施展的法术、能力或特性失败并且没有产生效果。任何使用的材料成分都将被消耗，并且消耗的法术位将被浪费。

Gutter Runner.name: 街头跑者Gutter Runner
Gutter Runner.description:
你获得等于你行走速度的攀爬速度，如果你没有运动和特技的熟练项，你也会获得它们。你在使用这些熟练值进行的属性检定中加上双倍的熟练值。

此外，当你在你的回合内使用疾走dash动作时，你可以不受惩罚地穿过其他生物的空间（但不能在其中停留）。当你这么做时，你不会触发借机攻击。

Contaminated Fury.name: 污浊狂怒 Contaminated Fury
Contaminated Fury.description:
从你3级选择此道途开始，你可以将被污染的狂怒引导到武器攻击中。每回合一次，狂暴期间，你可以对被你的武器攻击命中的目标额外造成 1d8 点暗蚀伤害。当你达到 10 级时，这个额外伤害会增加至 2d8；当你达到 14 级时，增加至 3d8。

此外，你还可以自主吸收污染，进一步增强近战武器攻击的威力。当你用近战武器攻击命中一个生物时，你可以选择给自己注入1级或更多的污染，并在那次武器伤害外对目标造成额外的暗蚀伤害。每获得1级污染，额外伤害就增加 2d8。

attack.condition: 狂暴期间，当你以徒手打击命中一个生物时

Chaos Theory.name: 混沌理论 Chaos Theory
Chaos Theory.description: 每回合当你进行攻击检定、属性检定或豁免检定时，你可以选择触发一个奥术异常。如果你这样做，你将以优势进行该检定。你可以使用此特性的次数等于你的魅力调整值（最少一次）。你在完成一次长休后恢复所有已消耗的使用次数。

utility.condition: 当你进行攻击检定、属性检定或豁免检定时

Spellcasting.name: 施法Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
第3级起，你获得施法能力。参考施法规则中的一般施法流程，以及法师法术列表。

奥术法器 Arcane Focus 你可以使用一把武僧武器作为你施法时的奥术法器。

戏法 Cantrips 你从法师法术列表习得两个戏法。第10级时，你再额外习得一个法师戏法。

法术位 Spell Slots “织法武者施法能力”表中列出了你用以施展你法师法术的1环及更高环阶法术位数量。施展这些法术时，你必须同时消耗一个不低于该法术环阶的法术位。而已消耗的法术位可以通过完成以此长休进行恢复。

例如，若你已知1环法术 thunderwave ，并且有一枚可用的1环法术位和一枚可用的2环法术位，则你可以用两者之一施展 thunderwave

已知法术Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher 你习得三个自选的1环法师法术。

表格“织法武者施法能力”中“已知法术”一栏记录了你获得更多已知法术时的相应等级。例如，如果你在本职业达到第7级，则可以学习一个新的1环法术或2环法术。

你每次提升本职业等级时，可以将一个已知法术替换为另一个法师法术。这个新法术的环阶不能超过你所拥有的最高法术位达到环阶。

施法属性Spellcasting Ability 你通过沉思和冥想来学习法术，因此感知是你施展法师法术的关键属性。每当你的法术需要施法属性时均指向你的感知值。而你的法师法术的豁免DC和攻击检定，则使用你的感知调整值。

法术豁免DC ＝8＋你的熟练加值＋你的感知调整值

Mutant Strain: Weakness.name: 突变菌株：虚弱Weakness
Mutant Strain: Weakness.description: 目标的近战武器攻击只能造成一半伤害。

Reanimated Head.name: 颅获新生Reanimated Head
Reanimated Head.description:
你赋予一个人形生物尸体的脑袋新的生命，现在它为你的研究而服务。你可以将这个脑袋当作施法法器使用。这个脑袋会说通用语和另一种你所选的语言。

当你进行一次有熟练加值附加的智力属性检定时，你可以将d20得到的9或更低的出目视作10。除此之外，你获得奥秘和调查技能的熟练项。

你可以使用这个脑袋施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.I2LUSF5ogc7Bj62e] 而无需消耗法术位。一旦你使用了该特性，你不能再次使用它，直到你完成了一次短休或长休。

Mutant Strain.name: 突变菌株Mutant Strain
Mutant Strain.description:
你可以使你的疾病进化来产生新的病症。你习得你所选的两种突变菌株，并且每当你获得一个新的职业等级时，你可以将本特性给出的另一个不同菌株和你的一个已知菌株替换。当你达到特定等级时，你习得额外的一个突变菌株，如突变菌株已知表所示。

已知突变菌株

药剂师等级Number of Strains
3rd2
9th3
15th4

当你施展一个会造成疾病的法术时（例如 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.yv8R1NwzoZ6UJEsJ] or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1]），你可以对法术的其中一个目标造成你突变菌株中的一种额外效果，其效果将在法术持续时间内持续。当你习得一种突变菌株时，以下突变菌株可供你选择。如果一种菌株有等级要求，那么你必须至少达到该职业等级才能习得该菌株。

  • 头晕Dizziness. 目标不能使用反应。
  • 疲劳Fatigue. 每当该目标在对抗你疾病的法术豁免中失败，它的移动速度就降低5尺，直到它的下个回合开始。
  • 咳嗽Coughing Fits. 在目标的每个回合开始，它必须进行一次体质豁免以对抗你的法术豁免DC。若豁免检定失败，它将不能说话，直到它的下个回合开始。
  • 寒颤Shivers. 目标开始无法自控地哆嗦。在目标的每个回合开始，它手中持握的任何东西将会掉落在地。
  • 虚弱Weakness (9级). 目标的近战武器攻击只能造成一半伤害。
  • 干眼症Dry Eyes (9级). 每当目标在对抗你疾病的豁免检定中失败，它将陷入目盲状态，直到它的下个回合开始。
  • 高烧Intense Fever (9级). 目标无法恢复生命值。
  • 皮肤损伤Lesions (9级). 目标无法恢复生命值。
  • 作呕Nausea (15级). 。每当目标在对抗你疾病的豁免检定中失败，它陷入失能状态直到它的下个回合开始。
  • 萎缩Dystrophy (15级). 目标获得钝击、穿刺、挥砍伤害的易伤。

Path of the Old Gods.name: 野蛮人：古神道途Path of the Old Gods
Path of the Old Gods.description: 这些野蛮人认为自己天生就是武器，他们由神所创造，用以对抗神选之敌人。古神代表着原始的力量、桀骜不驯的野性和对传统的崇拜。追随古神的野蛮人往往亲近自然，将辉煌的战斗视为神的竞技场，而他们的目标则是消灭自己神明的敌人。

advancement.title: 神力灌注：技能熟练
advancement.hint: 如果你没有威吓技能的熟练项，获得之，并在你的威吓检定中加入双倍的熟练加值。

Esoteric Theory: Pharmacology.name: 隐秘理论：药理学Pharmacology
Esoteric Theory: Pharmacology.description: 当你以药剂师法术位或大公式特性施展一个法术，为一个生物恢复生命值时，该生物额外恢复等同于你智力调整值的生命值。

Ability Score Improvement.name: 属性值提升
Ability Score Improvement.description:
当你达到第4、8、12、16、19级时，你可以选择一项属性值提升2点，或是选择两项属性各提升1点。通常情况下，你不能通过此特性让属性值超过20。

使用可选的专长规则，你可以放弃获得此特性，改为获得一个你所选的专长替换之。

Rooftop Mobility.name: 屋顶机动Rooftop Mobility
Rooftop Mobility.description:
你的速度增加10尺，并且在你的回合内，你能以附赠动作执行疾走dash。

此外，你已经掌握了在移动和攀登时辗转腾挪的方法，当你使用疾走dash动作时，你的跳跃距离会随移动速度一样增加。

Serpent Spring.name: 腾蛇舞 Serpent Spring
Serpent Spring.description:
你可以借助长柄武器腾空跃起。当你握持一把具有触及Reach属性的武器时，你的跳跃距离翻倍。

当你握持一把具有触及Reach属性的武器时，每当你消耗气使用飞檐走壁特性，你的跳跃距离将在本回合内变为三倍，且本回合你的下一次近战武器攻击具有优势。

Esoteric Theory: Liability Insurance.name: 隐秘理论：防患未然Liability Insurance
Esoteric Theory: Liability Insurance.description: 你可以在不消耗法术耗材的情况下以自身为目标施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4smlOvpF5AQHcyg1] 。你不能再次这样做直到完成一次长休。

Psionic Power: Careful Examination.name: 心能力量：精密检查Careful Examination
Psionic Power: Careful Examination.description: 每当你施展为一个生物恢复生命值的法术时，你可以消耗一个心灵点。如果你这样做，该法术的所有目标都额外恢复等同于你智力调整值两倍的生命值。

heal.condition: 每当你施展为一个生物恢复生命值的法术时

Demolitions Expert.name: Demolitions Expert
Demolitions Expert.description:
先决条件：炼金工具熟练项

每天一次，在完成长休后，你可以花费一小时，使用工具，将野外收集或找到的材料制作成一个特殊混合物或灌注物。在这段时间内你必须可以使用你的工具。随着你的等级提高，你将学会制作更强大的物品，如下表所示。这些造物将在24小时后因变为惰性而失效。更多信息见核心规则。

Demolitions Expert Creations
Level 1@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.FvNOwWbh5FXyX4xe]
5级炸弹
11级榴弹

Exorcism.name: 驱魔Exorcism
Exorcism.description:
第3级时，你获得了新能力：通过将神圣能量注入圣徽，驱散一定范围内的邪恶实体，或治愈它们对你盟友的有害影响。当你使用该特性时，你可以选择创造哪种效果。

你可以使用该特性的次数等同于你熟练加值的一半，当完成一次长休或短休后，你恢复所有使用次数。

如果一个特性的效果需要目标进行豁免检定，其豁免DC等同于你药剂师法术的豁免DC。第5级起，当一个邪魔或不死生物在对抗你驱散邪恶特性的豁免检定中失败时，那么该生物将承受4d8点光耀伤害。

驱散邪恶Expel Evil。 以一个动作，你高举圣徽，念出祷言谴责那些意图伤害你的生物。你身边30尺范围内所有能看到或听到你的不死生物，天界生物，精类生物或邪魔必须进行一次感知豁免。如果生物豁免检定失败，它将被驱散1分钟或直到受到任何伤害。

  • 一个被驱散的生物将在它的回合内尽其所能地远离你，并且它也不愿停留在一个离你30尺范围内的空间中。它也无法使用反应。对于动作，它只能使用疾跑或其他能逃离限制其移动的动作。该生物无路可走时会使用“回避”动作。

净化不洁Purge Corruption 。 你触碰一个生物或物件，结束任意一种正折磨它的状态。这个状态可以是 &Reference[blinded apply=false], &Reference[charmed apply=false], &Reference[deafened apply=false], &Reference[frightened apply=false], &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]，或 &Reference[poisoned apply=false].

  • 中的一种。另外地，如果一个生物被幽灵或异界生物附身、精神控制，你可以使用该特性移除任何来自附身者的个性或其他特性。如果是附身，附身的生物将被驱赶到它宿主身边5尺范围内一处未被占据的空间，并承受2d8+你药剂师等级的心灵伤害。

Esoteric Theories.name: 隐秘理论Esoteric Theories
Esoteric Theories.description:
你已经发现了一些隐秘理论，这些失落学问的只言片语可以用来强化你的魔法能力。

第2级起，你获得两种你所选的隐秘理论。可供你所选的理论在职业描述最后有详述。当你获得特定药剂师等级时，你可以额外获得你选择的理论，如药剂师职业表所展示的已知理论栏所示。除此之外，每当你获得一个该职业等级时，你可以选择一个你已经学习的理论，并用你当前等级可学习的另一个理论替换之。

Psionic Power: Fight or Flight Response.name: 心能力量：战逃反应Fight or Flight Response
Psionic Power: Fight or Flight Response.description: 以一个附赠动作，你可以将自己传送到30尺范围内你能看到的一个未被占据的空间去。你立刻获得等同于你智力调整值两倍的临时生命值。

Spell Resistance.name: 法术抗性
Spell Resistance.description: 你对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Investigative Mind.name: 察微析理Investigative Mind
Investigative Mind.description:
先决条件：驱魔人套组、吸血鬼猎人工具箱或调查员套组熟练项

你的智力增加1，上限为20。

你获得智力（调查）技能的熟练，并且在你使用该熟练进行的任何能力检定上，你的熟练加值翻倍。

当你调查一个区域、物体或生物时，你可以向DM提出等于你熟练加值的问题数量。DM必须给出真实的回答，但如果问题的答案是不可知的或对于凡人调查者来说不可能推断出的，DM只会回答“是”、“否”或“未知”。

一旦你关于一个物体、生物或区域提出问题后，你在完成一个长休之前不能再次使用这个能力提出更多问题。

advancement.hint: 你的智力增加1，上限为20。

utility.condition: 当你调查一个区域、物体或生物时

Draw Corruption.name: 汲取腐化Draw Corruption
Draw Corruption.description: 你获得将污染引到你的身体之中，并以此增强你的魔法的能力。每回合一次，以一个附赠动作，你获得一级污染等级。如果你这么做，你回复一次荒野变形特性使用次数。

Stabilizing Focus.name: 稳态专注Stabilizing Focus
Stabilizing Focus.description: 当你专注于一道法术时，你忽视任何污染症状，除了怪物转变Monstrous Transformation

Shifting Shadows.name: 移形换影 Shifting Shadows
Shifting Shadows.description:
你能够扭曲其他生物周围的暗影来跨越空间拉取他们。

以一个动作，你能选择一个你能看到的距离你60尺以内处于微光光照或黑暗中的生物。你将该生物传送到你选择的同样处于微光光照或黑暗中、你能看到且未被占据的空间，距离最多60尺。所选择的空间必须是一个可以容下而无需挤压目标生物的表面或液体。成功通过感知豁免对抗你的法术豁免DC的非自愿生物不受影响。

Breakthrough Infection.name: 突破感染 Breakthrough Infection
Breakthrough Infection.description: 当你消耗一个法术位或使用大公式特性施展一个法术来制造疾病时，该法术无视生物对疾病的任何免疫。作为替代，这些生物在对抗你疾病的豁免检定中获得优势。

Reshaped Form: Inverse Kneecaps.name: 血肉改造:逆转髌骨Inverse Kneecap
Reshaped Form: Inverse Kneecaps.description: 你的腿变得更加有力，并且你的膝盖现在向相反的方向弯曲。当你执行此选项时，你的步行速度增加10尺，并且你跳跃的距离和高度变成两倍。

Reshaped Form: Inverse Kneecaps.name: 血肉改造:逆转髌骨Inverse Kneecap

Cycle of Contamination.name: 污秽轮回Cycle of Contamination
Cycle of Contamination.description: 尽管你的魔法中充斥着污染之力，你仍然学会了如何高效地清除这些力量。你能够以一个动作施展@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.RCZRkk5mU0PoswsG]法术，无需消耗法术位。当你以这种方式施展这个法术时，你也不需要提供法术的材料成分，并且目标不会因这个法术而获得力竭等级。当以这种方式施展祛除污染后，直到完成一次长休为止你无法再次这么做。

Esoteric Theory: Bedside Manner.name: 隐秘理论：病榻话术Bedside Manner
Esoteric Theory: Bedside Manner.description: 你获得洞悉和说服技能的熟练。你以这些技能进行任何属性检定时获得双倍的熟练加值。

Esoteric Theory: Bedside Manner.name: 隐秘理论：病榻话术Bedside Manner
Esoteric Theory: Bedside Manner.description: 你获得洞悉和说服技能的熟练。你以这些技能进行任何属性检定时获得双倍的熟练加值。

Chemical Compound.name: 化合物Chemical Compoun
Chemical Compound.description: 你获得炼金工具的熟练项，如果你还没有的话。你同时习得戏法火焰箭Fire bolt和法师法术列表中额外一个你所选的塑能学派戏法。这些法术视为你的药剂师法术，并且它们不计入你的已知戏法。

Esoteric Theory: Subject Preparation.name: 隐秘理论：受试准备Subject Preparation
Esoteric Theory: Subject Preparation.description: 当你用近战武器攻击命中一个生物后，该生物在你的下一个回合结束前的下一个对抗你释放的药剂师法术的豁免检定具有劣势。

utility.condition: 当你用近战武器攻击命中一个生物时

Fearless Commander.name: 无畏司令 Fearless Commander
Fearless Commander.description: 你获得感知豁免的熟练项。且你对抗使你魅惑或恐慌的效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Smuggler.name: 走私者 Smuggler
Smuggler.description: 每当有人需要将一些贵重的——通常还是非法的——东西谨慎地送达目的地时，他们就会找上走私者。这些游荡者是隐藏、盗窃和匿迹于一般大众之中的专家。他们还擅长在事与愿违的时候扭转局面，并不择手段地达成目的。这些狡猾的游荡者灵活又诡诈，他们绝对不容小觑。

advancement.title: 生意秘诀：工具熟练
advancement.hint: 你获得易容工具、水陆载具的熟练项。

Bottled Spells.name: 瓶中法术Bottled Spells
Bottled Spells.description: 当你施展一个来自化学家法术特性的法术时，你可以将它以液态形式装在你触碰的一个小试管或瓶中。这个法术会始终存储在里面直到一个生物将瓶子打开。一旦你使用了这个特性，你之前创造出来的任何未被使用过的瓶中法术都会失效，并且直到完成一次短休之前，你不能再将一个法术装入瓶中。任何持握瓶子的生物都可以花费一个动作打开瓶子，释放里面的法术。这个法术使用你的法术攻击加值和豁免DC，但该法术在所有其他方面都将打开瓶中的生物视为法术施展者。

utility.condition: 当你施展一个来自化学家法术特性的法术时

Esoteric Theory: Caustic Formulae.name: 隐秘理论：腐蚀性公式Caustic Formulae
Esoteric Theory: Caustic Formulae.description: 每回合一次，当你用药剂师法术对一个生物或物件造成伤害时，你可以消耗一个药剂师法术位，以此对目标造成额外 2d4+每法术位等级2d4 点的强酸伤害。

utility.condition: 每回合一次，当你用药剂师法术对一个生物或物件造成伤害时

The Flesh.name: 畸变血肉
The Flesh.description:
畸变者邪术师一般是与一个未知的陌生异域存在缔结契约，光是认知它们的存在就足以让人疯狂。这些邪术师允许那些异域存在以一种古老而神秘令人无法理解的不可名状的形式寄居在他们的体内，赋予他们力量，但是代价是扭曲，或者说，重塑他们的血肉形态。

扩展法术列表

学习邪术师法术时，你的畸变血肉宗主赐予你将以下法术加入邪术师法术列表进行选择的权力。

畸变血肉拓展法术
环位法术
一环@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZrTc23tToJ0JpH2h], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]
2环@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9eOZDBImVKxbeOyZ], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]
3环@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Szvk5FEVQW3uhJi5], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yqUDoxk4x0NWG5Bz]
4环@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]
5环@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zMEo5DKK8uxsuWnq]{Reincarnate}

Esoteric Theory: Vital Signs.name: 隐秘理论：生命体征Vital Signs
Esoteric Theory: Vital Signs.description: 当30尺范围内你可见的一个生物在一次豁免检定或死亡豁免中失败时，你可以使用你的反应将你的智力调整值加到该生物的掷骰结果中，此举有可能使该检定由失败转为成功。你不能对同一个生物再次使用该理论直到你完成一次短休。

utility.condition: 当30尺范围内你可见的一个生物在一次豁免检定或死亡豁免中失败时

Trapmaker.name: 陷阱制造者Trapmaker
Trapmaker.description:
先决条件：修补工具或盗贼工具熟练项

在完成长休后，你可以花费一小时使用你选择的工具，将野外收集或找到的材料制作成一个特殊陷阱。

这些陷阱可以使用一个动作放置在地面上，占据一个5尺×5尺的方格。调查该区域的生物必须成功通过一次DC 15的感知（察觉）或智力（调查）检定，才能发现陷阱。如果有生物踏入陷阱所在的空间，该生物将立即触发陷阱。你可以制作下列任一陷阱：

陷阱豁免DC= 等于8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的智力或敏捷调整值（由你选择）

Basic Traps

纠缠陷阱. 触发陷阱的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，（DC为陷阱豁免DC）未通过豁免的生物将被束缚。被束缚的生物可以花费一个动作进行一次DC为陷阱豁免DC的力量检定，以从陷阱中挣脱。

尖刺陷阱 触发陷阱的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免（DC为陷阱豁免DC）。未通过豁免的生物将受到2d6穿刺伤害。

声波陷阱触发时发出响声，陷阱发出的声音可在300尺范围内被听到。

高级陷阱

从10级开始，你可以制作以下高级陷阱：

爆炸陷阱 发陷阱的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免（DC为陷阱豁免DC）。未通过豁免的生物受到4d6火焰伤害，并应击倒地。

毒气陷阱 触发陷阱的生物必须进行一次体质豁免（DC为陷阱豁免DC）。未通过豁免的生物受到3d8毒素伤害，并在其下一回合结束前中毒。

气体陷阱 触发陷阱的生物必须进行一次感知豁免（DC为陷阱豁免DC）。未通过检定的生物直到其下一回合结束前将处于失能状态。

Transmogrifying Elixir.name: 变形灵药Transmogrifying Elixir
Transmogrifying Elixir.description:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一个法术位来进行一次怪诞转变。这个转变持续一分钟，或你的生命值归零或失能。当你进行这场转变后你保留你的个性，阵营，以及游戏数据。然而，依然存在几个变化：

  • 你的力量属性和你的智力属性替换。
  • 你的体型变为大型，你的跳跃距离翻倍，并且当你进行推、拉、负重及你能带动的重量时你视为大一个体型。
  • 你的每一个手掌变为一个大肉拳，你可以以之施展近战武器攻击。它被你视为简易武器。你的大肉拳命中时，造成1d10+你的力量调整值+你的药剂师等级的钝击伤害。
  • 你无法施法或维持法术的专注。
  • 你获得120尺的黑暗视觉。
  • 你获得等同于你药剂师等级五倍的临时生命值。

你还能根据你所调化合物的不同效力来增强你的能力。这与你为变身所消耗的法术环位有关联：

  • 每消耗一阶法术环位，你的移动速度提升5尺。
  • 你的AC变为13+你消耗的法术环阶。
  • 在每个回合开始，只要你保有至少1点生命值，你恢复等同于你所消耗的法术环阶数的生命值。
小提示

为了让这个功能使用起来更便捷，建议使用本模组自带的宏@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.macros.Macro.NscWvS6iSJhrg4oF]

Haze Aura.name: 污霭灵光Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description:
你的身体成为了污染的核心，能够向周围散布污霭。只要你没有陷入失能，灵光就会一直存在。你选择的生物在你的10尺内开始回合时必须进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的体质豁免。豁免失败的生物受到3d6黯蚀伤害。失败且结果低于DC5及以上的的生物还会获得一级污染。

在豁免成功后，生物在24小时内免疫你的污霭灵光。

Haze Aura Immunity.name: 污霭灵光免疫
Haze Aura Immunity.description: 在成功豁免了 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.EP7KHZFUDaf1R4ga]{Haze Aura} 特性，你在24小时内免疫污霭灵光。

Psionic Power: Enhanced Cerebellum.name: 心能力量：小脑强化Enhanced Cerebellum
Psionic Power: Enhanced Cerebellum.description: 当你施展任何来自精神师法术特性的一环及更高环阶法术时，你可以如常消耗法术位释放它，或消耗数值等同于其法术环阶的心灵点。

Death Hex.name: 死亡邪术 Death Hex
Death Hex.description: 被你的邪术诅咒或折磨诅咒影响的生物对所有伤害都具有易伤。

Expert Armorsmith.name: 专家铠甲匠Expert Armorsmith
Expert Armorsmith.description:
Requires proficiency in smith's tools or leatherworker's tools

你对工艺的深入了解使你能够与同行以物易物和交流技术，当与铠甲匠交谈时，你在依赖魅力的技能检定上获得熟练。此外，如果你花费1分钟检查任何一套盔甲，你可以识别其制造方法、起源和特性。

每当你进行长休时，你能为你或一个盟友改进一件非魔法盔甲。你必须花费1小时来进行这项活动，这段时间内你必须可以使用你的工具。

你可以选择以下伤害类型之一：火焰、寒冷、闪电、强酸或毒素。该盔甲赋予其穿戴者对所选伤害类型的抗性，直到你再次使用这个特性。

从12级开始，你的锻造技能现在赋予所选伤害类型的免疫，而非抗性。

Force Manipulation.name: 念力操纵Force Manipulation
Force Manipulation.description: 你的精神能力允许你控制自身周围的现实结构，这允许你无视重力，只需要一个念头就能让自己飞到空中。以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一个心灵点，使自己获得等同于步行速度的飞行速度，持续一分钟。在这期间你可以悬停。

Serpent Style.name: 委蛇态
Serpent Style.description:
你获得长柄刀、戟、长矛、三叉戟和所有类矛或长柄武器的熟练项。即使这些武器具有重型或双手属性，它们仍对你视作武僧武器。此外，你在使用这些武器时的优雅和熟练令你的徒手攻击不会因握持双手武器而受限。

当你双手握持长棍、矛或三叉戟时，那个武器获得触及Reach属性

Negation.name: 反斥力
Negation.description: 以一个反应，当一个你能看见的敌对生物以你的盟友为目标发动一次攻击、法术或其他效果时，你可以消耗一个药剂师法术位来强迫它进行一次魅力豁免来对抗你的施法DC。若豁免检定失败，则它们的尝试失败并且资源将被浪费。

save.condition: 以一个反应，当一个你能看见的敌对生物以你的盟友为目标发动一次攻击、法术或其他效果时

Elemental Adjustment.name: 元素调节Elemental Adjustment
Elemental Adjustment.description: 当你使用药剂师法术环位施展一个造型以下伤害类型之一的法术时，你可以将伤害类型替换为所列出的另一个类型：强酸，冷冻，火焰，闪电，或毒素。

Psionic Power: Mentally Prepared.name: 心能力量：心理准备Mentally Prepared
Psionic Power: Mentally Prepared.description: 每回合一次，当一个在你30尺范围内能看到的一个目标，包括你自己，在一次智力、感知或魅力豁免中失败时，你可以消耗一个心灵点将你的智力调整值加到该生物的豁免检定结果中去，这有可能使豁免的失败转为成功。

utility.condition: 当一个在你30尺范围内能看到的一个目标，包括你自己，在一次智力、感知或魅力豁免中失败时

Extra Attack.name: 额外攻击
Extra Attack.description: 第6级起，你在自己回合内执行攻击动作时可以发动两次攻击而非一次。

Path of the Haze Rager.name: 污霭狂怒者道途
Path of the Haze Rager.description: 第一批冒险进入德拉肯海姆的勇士们注定会失败。在探险的初期，很少有人能活着归来，而那些幸存下来的少数人则将永远被这段经历所改变。极少数人学会了通过一种超自然的狂怒与污霭的疯狂相抗衡，这种狂怒使他们能够驱使妄质中的魔能。这些污霭狂怒者在妄质的污染下成长，将疯狂和恐惧转化为武器。他们对能力的运用使他们对污染有着超乎常人的耐受力，据说这些野蛮人甚至能在最可怕的变异中幸存下来。

advancement.title: Octarine Blood: Damage Resistance
advancement.hint: You gain resistance to necrotic, poison, psychic, and radiant damage.

Ki: Focus Power.name: 气：法力聚焦
Ki: Focus Power.description: 当你施放一个法术时，你可以消耗气来提升该法术的环阶，就如同你使用了一个更高环的法术位进行了这次施法。你必须像正常施法一样消耗法术位来施法，且你每提高该法术1环就额外消耗1点气。你可以将法术环阶提升至你可使用的最高法术位以上，至高可以提升至等于你的熟练加值的法术环阶。例如，如果你是一名11级织法武者武僧，当你使用一个2环法术位施放灼热射线scorching ray 时，你可以消耗2点气将该法术提高至4环。

Cosmic Guidance.name: 宇宙指南Cosmic Guidance
Cosmic Guidance.description: 你可以说、读、写天界语和深潜语。此外，你习得戏法神导术，它不计入你的邪术师可知戏法总数中。你还可以施展一次卜筮术而不用消耗法术位。你在完成一次长休后才能再次以此法施展此法术。

Bonus Cantrips.name: 附赠戏法 Bonus Cantrips
Bonus Cantrips.description: 你习得戏法：冻寒之触chill touch和次级幻影minor illusion 。这些戏法对你而言视作牧师法术，且不计入你的已知牧师戏法上限。

Esoteric Theory: Stolen Secrets.name: 隐秘理论：奥秘窃来Stolen Secrets
Esoteric Theory: Stolen Secrets.description: 你从任意一个职业的法术列表中习得一个法术，它必须等于或低于你所拥有的药剂师法术位环阶，这个法术被视为你的药剂师法术，并且不计入你已知的药剂师法术数量。

Advanced Palate.name: 高等味觉Advanced Palate
Advanced Palate.description:
先决条件：厨师工具或酿酒工具熟练项

每当你进行短休时，你和最多6个盟友可以享用由你准备的简餐。当他们这样做时，他们在那次休息期间使用的任何生命骰都视为他们掷出了最大值。一旦你使用了这个特性，你必须在完成一次长休后才能再次使用它。

在长休期间，你可以使用手头的任何食材为最多八个生物准备一顿丰盛的饭菜。食用该餐食的生物在24小时内获得餍足强韧。当生物拥有餍足强韧时，如果该生物未通过一次豁免，他可以选择改为成功。这个好处将在使用后或是24小时后失效。

Unnatural Evolution: Cerebellum Genome.name: 异常进化：小脑基因Cerebellum Genome
Unnatural Evolution: Cerebellum Genome.description:
在你变身时，你保有了部分的神智，允许你残余的部分知识徘徊在你畸形的大脑里。现在当你处于变身状态时，你有能力保留施法专注。

当你处于变身状态时，你的专注不会因受到伤害而被打断。

Increased Threshold.name: 强化阈值Increased Threshold
Increased Threshold.description:
长期暴露于魔能的污染之下使你的身体逐渐适应了其影响，并能够承受更大的污染总量。你获得体质豁免的熟练项以及对黯蚀伤害的抗性。在决定由于魔能污染而导致的症状时，你被视为具有当前污染等级一半的污染等级（向下取整）。例如，如果你有5级污染等级，你只会遭受2级污染等级的症状。因此，你需要获得12级污染等级才会触发怪物转变Monstrous Transformation，而非6级。

同理，在获得新的污染等级时检定是否会产生突变时，你被视为具有当前污染等级一半的污染等级（向下取整）。例如，如果你获得了4级污染等级，只有在1d6掷骰结果为2或更低时，你才会产生新的突变。

请注意，如果你拥有6级或更多的污染等级，在受到 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.RCZRkk5mU0PoswsG] 法术的影响时，你将获得6级（或更多）的力竭，并因此死亡。

Exorcist.name: 驱邪师 Exorcist
Exorcist.description:
驱邪师们随时准备去对付邪恶的实体，凶恶的鬼魂，以及可怖的邪魔。装备着他们的圣徽，一本祈祷书，以及一包仪式用的小道具，驱邪师们随时准备面对王国内最超自然、乃至来自异域的实体。驱邪师们习惯于凭借手中的一枚小小圣徽，以身为盾，在一众怪物前守护着王国的人类，面对那些难以战胜的威胁。

驱邪师法术

驱邪师等级法术
1级@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.xmDBqZhRVrtLP8h2]
3级@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JbxsYXxSOTZbf9I0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CylBa7jR8DSbo8Z3]
5级@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uCud2s4TjMfjiXUb]
7级@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.Wmg60KwX5QlbBvPd]
9级@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]

advancement.title: 灵魂研究：技能熟练项
advancement.hint: 你获得宗教技能的熟练项。如果你已经有了此技能的熟练，你获得你任选的一个其他技能的熟练项。

advancement.title: 灵魂研究：护甲熟练项
advancement.hint: 你获得重甲的熟练项。

advancement.title: 驱散邪恶  对邪恶伤害
受祝之躯：恐慌免疫
advancement.hint: 你免疫恐慌状态

Orbit: Interception.name: Orbit: Interception
Orbit: Interception.description: You can use your reaction to intercept a melee or ranged attack, gaining resistance to the damage from that attack.

utility.condition: when you are targeted by a melee or ranged attack

Ki: Eldritch Flurry.name: Ki: Eldritch Flurry
Ki: Eldritch Flurry.description:
Whenever you take the Attack action on your turn, you can cast one of your cantrips in place of one of those attacks.

When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead of making unarmed strikes. Finally, when you use your action to cast a spell, you may treat this as taking an attack with a monk weapon for the purposes of your other monk features.

utility.condition: When you use your Flurry of Blows

Immunocompromised.name: Immunocompromised
Immunocompromised.description: A creature infected with one of your diseases (such as @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.yv8R1NwzoZ6UJEsJ] or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1]) has disadvantage on saving throws against your apothecary spells.

Coordinated Command.name: Coordinated Command
Coordinated Command.description: When you issue a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.RUwv29zJiPqIgYpK]{battle command} on your turn, you can target two allies instead of one. You can give both the same command or a different command to each ally. Both targets must be within 120 feet of you.

Orbit: Lightspeed.name: Orbit: Lightspeed
Orbit: Lightspeed.description: As a bonus action, you can consume a comet to teleport 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Esoteric Theory: Double Dose.name: Esoteric Theory: Double Dose
Esoteric Theory: Double Dose.description: When you cast an apothecary spell using an apothecary spell slot that targets a single creature and restores hit points to that creature, you can target an additional creature within range.

Channel Divinity: Curse of Torment.name: Channel Divinity: Curse of Torment
Channel Divinity: Curse of Torment.description: As a bonus action, you curse one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Searing pain wracks the target for one minute. While suffering this pain, it takes necrotic damage equal to your paladin level at the start of each of its turns. Each time it takes this damage, it can make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the pain ends.

Esoteric Theory: Venomous Instruments.name: Esoteric Theory: Venomous Instruments
Esoteric Theory: Venomous Instruments.description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes extra poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Erudite Education.name: Erudite Education
Erudite Education.description: You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill. Whenever you make an Intelligence ability check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

Reshaped Form: Hardened Skin.name: Reshaped Form: Hardened Skin
Reshaped Form: Hardened Skin.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons.

Ki: Viper Strike.name: Ki: Viper Strike
Ki: Viper Strike.description: Once on your turn when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend 1 or more ki points, up to a number equal to your proficiency bonus. The attack deals 1d6 poison damage, plus 1d6 additional poison damage per ki point spent, and the target is poisoned until the end of your next turn.

utility.condition: when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack

College of Doomsayers.name: College of Doomsayers
College of Doomsayers.description: Bards of this college revel in the fear and despair of others. They have foreseen the end of times, and use their gifts of prophecy to instill terror in those who hear their words. These bards command an audience like any other, but their craft is that of a mad prophet, and their poems and songs echo dissonant rattlings of hopelessness and suffering. Those who hear the mad ramblings are stricken with fear, lose their wills, and fall into madness.

advancement.title: True Believer: Fear Immunity
advancement.hint: Convinced of your impending doom, you no longer fear death. You are immune to being frightened.

Forbidden Study.name: Forbidden Study
Forbidden Study.description:
Whenever you gain a wizard level, you can add one Contaminated Spell to your spellbook. This is in addition to the two wizard spells you normally learn.

You don't need to research or discover the spell beforehand, instead developing the spell as a result of your own research.

Contaminated Sorcery.name: Contaminated Sorcery
Contaminated Sorcery.description: When you cast a contaminated spell, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level. If you cast the spell using sorcery points, you don't gain a Contamination Level by casting the spell, and if the spell requires delerium as a material component, it is not consumed by the spell. In addition, casting a contaminated spell in this manner immediately causes an Arcane Anomaly (see page 233).

Spark of Life.name: Spark of Life
Spark of Life.description: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XvbiNhNqXXIFisIy] and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8zT7njvqbpXs4Cel] cantrips. These count as apothecary spells for you, and don't count against the number of apothecary cantrips you know.

Alienist.name: Alienist
Alienist.description:
An Alienist seeks to master the mysteries of the mind. Having devoted years to studying the inner workings of the brain, and unlocking its latent potential, an Alienist is able to read and manipulate the thoughts of others, and bend reality itself. They tap into unfathomable realities and shift the world to their will using the psychic energies they call upon from eldritch lore and arcane knowledge.

Alienist Spells

Apothecary LevelSpell
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eS7XnnApoxRxYXPs], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BQk5Row4NymMnUQl]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp]
7th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ImlCJQwR1VL40Qem], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A4RsPuSvB9wFtz1j]
9th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ATo0Eb63TDtnu6iA], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.r3243JU4AyQJyfX4]

advancement.title: Advanced Psychology: Skill
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with another skill of your choice.

advancement.title: Impenetrable Mind
advancement.hint: You gain resistance to psychic damage, and immune to being charmed and frightened.

Esoteric Theory: Vivisection.name: Esoteric Theory: Vivisection
Esoteric Theory: Vivisection.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a 19 or 20.

Octarine Blood.name: Octarine Blood
Octarine Blood.description: You gain resistance to necrotic, poison, psychic, and radiant damage, and your hit point maximum can't be reduced.

Devout Witness.name: Devout Witness
Devout Witness.description:
As a Devout Witness, you speak on behalf of your gods and can feel their powers surging through you. Commanding spirits and vanquishing evil is second nature to you. You have added benefits that bolster your abilities.

  • Creatures who fail their saving throws against your Exorcism: Expel Evil feature take an additional 4d8 radiant damage.
  • Creatures who are aided by your Exorcism: Purge Corruption feature gain 4d8 temporary hit points.

Mutant Strain: Fatigue.name: Mutant Strain: Fatigue
Mutant Strain: Fatigue.description: Each time the target fails a saving throw against your disease, its speed is reduced to five feet until the start of its next turn.

Malfeasant.name: Malfeasant
Malfeasant.description: The path of the Malfeasant wizard unlocks eldritch abilities lesser spellcasters consider to be unnatural. Malfeasant wizards flout the restrictions of the Amethyst Academy which bar such forbidden magic. As a result, most hide from the Academy and the Silver Order, having been expelled from the school for their pursuit of such dark and dangerous magic.

advancement.title: Increased Threshold: Constitution Save Proficiency
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in Constitution saving throws.

advancement.title: Increased Threshold: Necrotic Resistance
advancement.hint: You gain resistance to necrotic damage.

Outbreak.name: Outbreak
Outbreak.description: When a creature infected by one of your diseases dies, you can use your reaction to spread the disease to a different creature you can see within 30 feet of that creature.

utility.condition: When a creature infected by one of your diseases dies

Berserk Fury.name: Berserk Fury
Berserk Fury.description: When you command your corpsewrought creature to take the Attack action, the creature can make two attacks.

Apotheosis in Flesh.name: Apotheosis in Flesh
Apotheosis in Flesh.description:
If you undergo a Monstrous Transformation, you maintain control over your new form for 1 minute.

Unless you die, you revert back to your original form after 24 hours. When you assume your original form, you gain the benefits of a long rest and all Contamination Levels are removed from you.

The Game Master determines what memories you retain from your transformation, if any. Regardless, the harrowing experience will haunt you in your nightmares forever, and you gain one form of Drakkenheim Madness (see page 231).

utility.condition: When you undergo a Monstrous Transformation

Mental Influence.name: Mental Influence
Mental Influence.description:
You have studied hard to unlock the deepest recesses of your psyche, unleashing untapped psychic potential within yourself. This energy is represented by a pool of Psychic Points. You have four psychic points. You gain two more at 6th level, another two at 10th, and two more again at 14th level, which you can expend to use the various psionic powers you have detailed below. If you have expended all your Psychic Points, you cannot use these powers. You regain all your expended Psychic Points when you finish a short or long rest.

  • Cerebral Breakthrough. When you cast an apothecary spell that deals damage, you can expend a Psychic Point to re-roll any number of the dice. You must use the new rolls.
  • Mind Over Matter. Whenever you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Psychic Point, reducing the damage taken by an amount equal to your apothecary level.
  • Mind Whisperer. When you cast an apothecary spell which does not deal damage, you may spend a psychic point to cast it without any somatic or verbal components.

Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough.name: Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough
Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough.condition: When you cast an apothecary spell that deals damage.

Psionic Power: Mind Whisperer.name: Psionic Power: Mind Whisperer
Psionic Power: Mind Whisperer.condition: When you cast an apothecary spell which does not deal damage.

Defile Elements.name: Defile Elements
Defile Elements.description: You learn the @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.Zl5sRTuiieHzAePp] spell, and always have this spell prepared (it doesn't count against the number of druid spells you can prepare). You can cast it once without a spell slot, material component, or gaining a contamination level, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you cast the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn't require concentration. When you do, the spell's duration for that casting changes to 1 minute.

Meteoric Impact.name: Meteoric Impact
Meteoric Impact.description:
Once per turn when you hit a creature with eldritch blast, you can cause the beam to explode. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 fire damage.

The damage increases to 4d6 damage at 14th level, and to 5d6 damage at 17th level.

save.condition: when you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast

Adaptive Genetics.name: Adaptive Genetics
Adaptive Genetics.description:
You are able to use your changed biology to protect yourself from the clutches of death. When you are reduced to 0 hit points in either your natural, or transmogrified state, your other self is ready to take over.

  • When in your natural form and reduced to 0 hit points you can immediately transform using your Transmogrifying Elixir feature expending a spell slot as normal. You regain a number of hit points equal to your Apothecary level when you do (in addition to gaining temporary hit points from your transformation).
  • When you are reduced to 0 hit points in your transmogrified form, you revert to your natural form with 1 hit point remaining. If you do, you can't assume your transmogrified form again until you finish a short or long rest.

heal.condition: When you are reduced to 0 hit points in either your natural, or transmogrified state

Sacred Vessel.name: Sacred Vessel
Sacred Vessel.description: You are immune to the frightened condition, and cannot be possessed or cursed. You also have advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

Esoteric Theory: Interdisciplinary Pract.name: Esoteric Theory: Interdisciplinary Practice
Esoteric Theory: Interdisciplinary Pract.description: When you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

Way of the Serpent.name: 盘蛇武者
Way of the Serpent.description: 身为使用长矛的大师，这种敏捷的战士不仅将这些长柄兵刃当做武器，它们同时也是自己肉体的延伸，他们使用这些武器增强自己的灵活性、机动性和战斗力。修行盘蛇武者的武僧就像是潜伏在草丛中的毒蛇，它可以磨炼修行者预测攻击、规避远距离袭击和精确制敌的能力。

advancement.title: 委蛇态：武器熟练
advancement.hint: 你获得长柄刀、戟、长矛、三叉戟和所有类矛或长柄武器的熟练。

Natural Philosophy.name: Natural Philosophy
Natural Philosophy.description: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies and either the herbalism kit or poisoner's kit. You also gain proficiency in two additional languages and the Nature Skill. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with another skill of your choice.

Inured to Corruption.name: Inured to Corruption
Inured to Corruption.description: If a spell, such as @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.RCZRkk5mU0PoswsG], has the sole effect of removing Contamination Levels from you, the caster doesn't need material components to cast the spell on you. In addition, if the spell would normally cause you to gain exhaustion, you don't gain exhaustion from the spell.

Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct.name: Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct
Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct.description: You have blindsight out to a range of 10 feet.

Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct.name: Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct
Esoteric Theory: Surgeon's Instinct.description: You have blindsight out to a range of 10 feet.

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.description:
When a creature within 5 feet of your corpsewrought creature makes an attack against you, it can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature. In addition, your corpsewrought creature's slam attack counts as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

In addition, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT] once using an Apothecary spell slot. Once you do, you can't cast the spell again until you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: When a creature within 5 feet of your corpsewrought creature makes an attack against you

Delerium Soul.name: Delerium Soul
Delerium Soul.description:
Delerium is naturally drawn to magic and can twist and augment its presence in unnatural and unpredictable ways. Some who ventured into the ruins of Drakkenheim are twisted by the eldritch powers and emerge infused with contaminated energies. They become a living vessel for the Arcane Anomalies and twisting realities found within the ruins.

Delerium Spells

Imbued with the eldritch power of delerium, your magic is fundamentally contaminated. You learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Delerium Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

Delerium Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.N5Y9HWajHMf0Ch0m], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.OSEwx1jvbxzRSkC6], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.y0Hjt94L5pDGhot3]
5th@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.BgqUVivqJ43rgAxf], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.kkTnKuh9hPMvoVSN]
7th@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.r2LmhwT41M46kPLP], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.Zl5sRTuiieHzAePp]

advancement.title: Delerium Spells: 1st Level
advancement.hint: Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

advancement.title: Delerium Spells: 2nd Level
advancement.hint: Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

advancement.title: Delerium Spells: 3rd Level
advancement.hint: Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

advancement.title: Delerium Spells: 4th Level
advancement.hint: Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

advancement.title: Delerium Spells: 5th Level
advancement.hint: Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

Reversal of Fortune.name: Reversal of Fortune
Reversal of Fortune.description: Whenever a creature scores a critical hit against you, the next time you hit that creature with an attack, that attack automatically becomes a critical hit.

Empowered Healing.name: Empowered Healing
Empowered Healing.description: Whenever you cast a spell that heals a creature, that spell deals maximum healing and the creature immediately gains temporary hit points equal to your apothecary level.

Battle Commands.name: Battle Commands
Battle Commands.description:
You can issue a battle command as a bonus action to an ally within 120 feet of you who can hear you. Choose one of the following commands:

  • Fight On! The target regains a number of hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. The creature can't regain hit points from this command again until it finishes a short or long rest.
  • For Glory! The target can use their reaction to make a melee or ranged weapon attack.
  • Move It! The target can use their reaction to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
  • Never Falter! The target recovers from one charmed or frightened condition. Once a creature benefits from this command, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

Recovered Wounds.name: Recovered Wounds
Recovered Wounds.description: This creature has regains hit points from the Fight On! command and cannot benefit from it again until it finishes a short or long rest.

Recovered Bravery.name: Recovered Bravery
Recovered Bravery.description: This creature has recovered from a condition listed from the Never Falter! command and cannot benefit from it again until it finishes a short or long rest.

Esoteric Theory: Adrenaline Surge.name: Esoteric Theory: Adrenaline Surge
Esoteric Theory: Adrenaline Surge.description: A creature at 0 hit points who regains hit points from a spell you cast using an apothecary spell slot gains resistance to all damage and has advantage on saving throws until the end of its next turn. It gains advantage on the first attack roll it makes on its next turn

Occult Practitioner.name: Occult Practitioner
Occult Practitioner.description:
先决条件：神秘学者工具或驱魔人套组熟练项，以及施法能力

将你的智力或魅力增加1，上限为20。

当你完成长休时，你可以触摸你的工具包并将你所知的一个法术注入其中。该法术的等级必须小于或等于你的熟练加值，且施法时间为1个动作。当持有你的工具包时，你可以使用一个动作施放此法术，而不需消耗法术位。你可以以这种方式施放该法术一次，然后必须完成一次长休才能再次这样做。物品保持被注入魔法的状态，直到你施放了注入的法术，或直到你再完成一次长休。

advancement.hint: Increase your Intelligence or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Mutant Strain: Dry Eyes.name: Mutant Strain: Dry Eyes
Mutant Strain: Dry Eyes.description: Each time the target fails a saving throw against your disease, it becomes blinded until the start of its next turn.

Blighted Magic: Corrupt Spell.name: Blighted Magic: Corrupt Spell
Blighted Magic: Corrupt Spell.description: When you roll damage for a spell, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to change the damage type of all damage caused by the spell to necrotic. In addition, you can reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Wisdom modifier (minimum one). You must use the new rolls.

utility.condition: When you roll damage for a spell

Behold, My Creation.name: Behold, My Creation
Behold, My Creation.description:
Your corpsewrought creature's size increases to Large, and its speed increases to 40 feet.

When your corpsewrought creature hits a creature with a melee attack, it can immediately make a grapple attempt against the target. The DC to escape this grapple is equal to 8 + the corpsewrought creature's strength modifier (+4) + your PB.

Unnatural Evolution: Giant Genome.name: Unnatural Evolution: Giant Genome
Unnatural Evolution: Giant Genome.description:
You become a hulking mass of flesh and muscle, turning yourself into a living siege weapon. Your size becomes Huge and all damage dealt to objects and structures is now doubled.

As an action, you can expend a spell slot on your turn to slam your fists into the ground, sending shockwaves and rubble crashing around you. All creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or they take 8d6 bludgeoning damage and are knocked prone. If they succeed on the saving throw, they take half damage and are not knocked prone.

Esoteric Theory: Toxicology.name: Esoteric Theory: Toxicology
Esoteric Theory: Toxicology.description: You add your Intelligence modifier to the damage rolls of spells that deal poison damage.

Circle Spells.name: Circle Spells
Circle Spells.description:
At 2nd level, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.vrN18tbTw7io5MWd] and @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.dtoYtccI3x7J3KVy] cantrips. These don't count against the number of druid cantrips you know.

At 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level you gain access to the spells listed for that level in the Circle of Contamination Spells table. Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it doesn't count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that doesn't appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

Circle of Contamination Spells

Druid LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.pO02rAZlJJMhHwDV], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.OSEwx1jvbxzRSkC6]
5th@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.RCZRkk5mU0PoswsG], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.OSEwx1jvbxzRSkC6]
7th@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.t23nxyfP3uBLmWfp], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.8qqOkrAkojDeH3ju]
9th@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.YsX6XFrUH1fVPgtn], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.y81xp7yqTRbyE2Pq]

Reborn in Darkness.name: Reborn in Darkness
Reborn in Darkness.description: You regain 10 hit points at the start of each of your turns while you are in darkness. If you take radiant damage, this regeneration doesn't function until the start of your next turn. You only die if you do not regenerate on your turn. Additionally, you do not age while you are in darkness.

Esoteric Theory: Virulence.name: Esoteric Theory: Virulence
Esoteric Theory: Virulence.description: When you roll a 1 on a damage die for an apothecary spell that deals poison damage, you can reroll the die. You must use the new result, even if the new roll is a 1.

Urban Ranger.name: 城市游侠
Urban Ranger.description:
Urban rangers are less accustomed to nature and the wilds, but to the rooftops and guerilla tactics of city warfare. Training for maneuverability and stealth amongst ruined buildings, and twisting streets, these rangers are at home amongst the ruins and rubble. They are agile runners, skilled snipers, and always able to know where the best vantage points against their enemies are.

Urban Ranger Spells

You learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Urban Ranger Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know

Urban Ranger Spells
Ranger LevelSpells

5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]

17th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ATo0Eb63TDtnu6iA]

advancement.title: Gutter Runner
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in the Athletics & Acrobatics skills if you don't already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

Esoteric Theory: Cosmetic Surgery.name: Esoteric Theory: Cosmetic Surgery
Esoteric Theory: Cosmetic Surgery.description: You can spend 8 hours performing an occult surgical procedure upon a willing creature, permanently transforming its appearance. You decide what the creature looks like, including facial features, the sound of its voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, but none of its game statistics change. You can't alter the size of a creature, and its basic shape stays the same. The resulting transformation is non-magical, however, a greater restoration spell or similar magic cast upon the creature can restore it to its original appearance.

Esoteric Theory: Doctor's Note.name: Esoteric Theory: Doctor's Note
Esoteric Theory: Doctor's Note.description: You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD] spell at-will. You must finish a long rest before you can use this theory to contact the same creature again.

Body Modification.name: Body Modification
Body Modification.description:
When you choose your reshaped form, you can choose any two options available to you.

You gain the following additional options when you take on a reshaped form.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.2ZWdZU14lohTIiTB]{Gelatin Bones.} Your skin looks loose and saggy as you struggle to maintain your structure. You can now fit into spaces as small as one inch in diameter and gain advantage on Stealth checks.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.dgLVwr3zeTG5CP7v]{Change Appearance.} You transform your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, if any. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your statistics change. You can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same. For example, if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.lvBvwlr8UiJfSaEb]{Combat Instincts.} You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action on your turn. In addition, your natural weapons and unarmed strikes are considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.tPb13vxQZDgaKMVR]{Spider Claws.} Your hands and feet grow strange mucus-slicked insectoid features that allow you to climb surfaces. You gain a climb speed equal to your walk speed and can stick to ceilings as well without needing to make an ability check.

Channel Divinity: Cloak of the Night.name: Channel Divinity: Cloak of the Night
Channel Divinity: Cloak of the Night.description:
You can use your Channel Divinity to invoke protective shadows.

As an action, you draw upon a curtain of magical shadow which lasts for 1 minute. When you do, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you to be enveloped by the cloak of the night (which can be yourself). While the cloak lasts, that creature has resistance to all damage while it is in dim light or darkness.

In addition, when you draw the cloak of night, all nonmagical light sources within 60 feet of you become extinguished. Magical light sources are dispelled if they were created by a spell with a level equal to or lower than your proficiency bonus.

Blend Into the Crowd.name: Blend Into the Crowd
Blend Into the Crowd.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by two or more creatures that aren't hostile to you. Those creatures must be within 5 feet of each other and at least your size or larger.

Smuggled Spells.name: Smuggled Spells
Smuggled Spells.description:
Beginning at 17th level, you can store spells cast by other creatures in your bag. Your bag can store up to 6 levels worth of spells at a time.

Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 5th level into your bag by touching the bag as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in your bag. If your bag can't hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

Alternatively, you can place a spell scroll in the bag. The spell is cast and stored in your bag and the spell scroll is destroyed. You can cast any spell stored in your bag. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the bag is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

Vantage Point.name: Vantage Point
Vantage Point.description: When you make a ranged weapon attack against a creature, you gain advantage on the attack roll if there are no other creatures within 5 feet of that target, or if you are 20 feet or more above the target and that creature doesn't have cover.

Esoteric Theory: Laboratory Assistant.name: Esoteric Theory: Laboratory Assistant
Esoteric Theory: Laboratory Assistant.description: You learn the spell @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JGT5bNqu9REL7Fuz], and always have this spell prepared. It doesn't count against the number of apothecary spells you can prepare.

Esoteric Theory: Surgical Strikes.name: Esoteric Theory: Surgical Strikes
Esoteric Theory: Surgical Strikes.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action on your turn.

Esoteric Theory: Nerve Agent.name: Esoteric Theory: Nerve Agent
Esoteric Theory: Nerve Agent.description: When you deal poison damage with your apothecary spells, you can choose to deal psychic damage instead.

Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough.name: Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough
Psionic Power: Cerebral Breakthrough.description: When you cast an apothecary spell that deals damage, you can expend a Psychic Point to re-roll any number of the dice. You must use the new rolls.

utility.condition: When you cast an apothecary spell that deals damage

Sturdy Build.name: Sturdy Build
Sturdy Build.description: Whenever you enter your rage or willingly end your rage on your turn, you can expend Hit Dice and regain hit points as if you had finished a short rest.

Supernova.name: Supernova
Supernova.description:
Charged by the energy of the stars, you gain additional benefits from the otherworldly entities lurking in the deep void of space.

  • When you cast eldritch balst, you can fire one additional beam.
  • Whenever you score a critical hit with eldritch blast, you can use your Meteoric Impact feature an additional time that turn.

Mutant Strain: Shivers.name: Mutant Strain: Shivers
Mutant Strain: Shivers.description: The target shakes uncontrollably. At the start of each of the target's turns, it drops whatever it is holding in its hands.

Slip Past.name: Slip Past
Slip Past.description:
You can move through another creature's space, including hostile creatures, without penalty when you take the Dash or Disengage action on your turn.

When you do so, you gain advantage on attack rolls against any creature whose space you moved through this turn.

Expert Bowyer.name: Expert Bowyer
Expert Bowyer.description:
Requires proficiency in carpenter's tools or woodcarver's tools

Your advanced knowledge of your craft allows you to barter and talk shop with others in your profession, you gain proficiency in Charisma checks you make when speaking to professional archers or bowyers. Additionally, you can identify the make, origin, and traits of any ranged weapon if you spend 1 minute examining it.

During a long rest, you may spend 1 hour working with your tools to tune up a non-magical ranged weapon. You increase the long range of that weapon by an amount equal to 10 × your proficiency bonus and no longer have disadvantage when firing your weapon at long range. Additionally, the weapon now scores a critical hit on a 19 or 20. The improvements last until you use this feature again.

The Cosmic.name: The Cosmic
The Cosmic.description:
Some warlocks gain their eldritch power from the very cosmos, answering to entities of space, the constellations, planets, and moons. A warlock swearing fealty to a Cosmic patron typically believes they speak to gods, or god-like beings, but these entities are shrouded in mystery, their appearance incomprehensible and horrible, and their divine power is bestowed into the warlock from the stars and galaxies beyond.

Expanded Spell List

The Cosmos lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Cosmic Expanded Spells
Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]
2nd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.bV3yun6MIuFj71Er], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7u2obDvuvtZBkTfq]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GSvLWcdCZLQkilXT], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uCud2s4TjMfjiXUb]
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6]
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]

advancement.title: Cosmic Guidance: Languages
advancement.hint: You can speak, read, and write Celestial and Deep Speech.

Unarmored Defense.name: Unarmored Defense
Unarmored Defense.description: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

Brute Strength.name: Brute Strength
Brute Strength.description:
You are relentless in battle, filled with a bloodlust and rage of the Old Gods. You are proficient with improvised weapons. Your unarmed strike and attacks with any melee weapons or improvised weapons that aren't light deal damage equal to 1d12 plus your Strength modifier.

While you are raging, you gain the following benefits:

  • All melee weapons you wield that aren't light gain the heavy and thrown properties, including improvised weapons. A weapon which doesn't specify a thrown range gains a range of 30/60 while you are wielding it.
  • Once on your turn when you hit a creature within 5 feet of you with a melee weapon attack, you can try to grapple or shove that creature as part of the same attack.
  • If your size is Small, you don't have disadvantage on attack rolls when wielding a heavy weapon.

Expert Weaponsmith.name: Expert Weaponsmith
Expert Weaponsmith.description:
Requires proficiency in smith's tools

Your advanced knowledge of your craft allows you to barter and talk shop with others in your profession, you gain proficiency in Charisma checks you make when speaking with weaponsmiths. Additionally, you can identify the make, origin, and traits of any melee weapon if you spend 1 minute examining it.

Whenever you take a long rest, you are able to improve one non-magical melee weapon for you or an ally. You must spend 1 hour to do so, and have access to your tools and at least 100 gp worth of metal or other materials.

The improvement you grant is equal to one half your proficiency bonus (rounded down). For example, at level 5, with a proficiency bonus of +3, you may make a +1 weapon. The improvement lasts until you use this feature again.

Esoteric Theory: Physiological Analysis.name: Esoteric Theory: Physiological Analysis
Esoteric Theory: Physiological Analysis.description:
If you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its physiology. The Game Master reveals to you two of the following characteristics of your choice:

  • Any one ability score

  • Armor Class

  • Current hit points

  • Resistances (if any)

  • Immunities (if any)

  • Vulnerabilities (if any)

Alternatively, you can spend 1 minute observing a corpse. After 1 minute, you determine the cause of death.

The End is Nigh.name: The End is Nigh
The End is Nigh.description: Your words strike fear into the hearts of those who bear witness to your doomsaying. Whenever you make a Charisma (Intimidation) check, you may treat any roll of 9 or lower as if you had rolled a 10.

Psionic Power: Mind Over Matter.name: Psionic Power: Mind Over Matter
Psionic Power: Mind Over Matter.description: Whenever you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Psychic Point, reducing the damage taken by an amount equal to your apothecary level.

Cobra Strike.name: Cobra Strike
Cobra Strike.description: When a creature you can see moves into your reach, you can use your reaction to make one attack against that creature.

utility.condition: When a creature you can see moves into your reach

Reshape Flesh.name: Reshape Flesh
Reshape Flesh.description:
As an action, you can take on a reshaped form, which lasts until you become incapacitated, use an action to change back, or use this feature again. When you do, choose from one of the reshaped forms below:

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.BluKJFOwzI5fufsY]{Inverse Kneecaps.} Your legs become more powerful, and your knees now bend the opposite direction. While in this form, you increase your walking speed by 10 feet, and you can double your long and high jump distance.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.2hlxSY7IxUk9rzgs]{Aquatic Attributes.} You grow gills and your skin becomes slimy, the flesh between your fingers and toes becomes webbed. While in this form, you can breathe underwater, and gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

@UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.features.Item.zAykyT9n9G7kolv5]{Natural Weapons.} You grow claws, fangs, spines, horns, or a different natural weapon of your choice. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, as appropriate to the natural weapon you chose, and you are proficient with your unarmed strikes. You can use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls.

The damage of your unarmed strikes increases as you gain levels in this class: 2d6 damage beginning at 10th level, and 3d6 damage at 14th level.

Ki: Meditative Casting.name: Ki: Meditative Casting
Ki: Meditative Casting.description: Starting at 17th level, when you cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action that requires your concentration, you can expend ki points equal to the spell's level to modify the spell so that it does not require your concentration. Instead, the spell lasts up to 1 minute, or its maximum duration, whichever is shorter.

utility.condition: when you cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action that requires your concentration

Supreme Serpent.name: Supreme Serpent
Supreme Serpent.description: When you adopt a Serpent Stance, you can instead adopt two serpent stances at the same time, gaining the benefits of both effects.

Impending Doom.name: Impending Doom
Impending Doom.description: A creature frightened of you has disadvantage on all saving throws it makes while it can see you.

Never Tell Me the Odds.name: Never Tell Me the Odds
Never Tell Me the Odds.description:
Sometimes when the odds seem against you is the exact right moment to pull a fast one on your foes, using the chaos to get in a vital strike.

You can still apply your Sneak Attack even when you have disadvantage on the attack roll, so long as you meet the other conditions for making a Sneak Attack.

Precise Application.name: Precise Application
Precise Application.description: When you cast a spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage to other creatures that you can see, you can choose a number of them equal to your Intelligence modifier. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save.

Esoteric Theory: Anesthesiology.name: Esoteric Theory: Anesthesiology
Esoteric Theory: Anesthesiology.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4] without expending a spell slot or requiring material components. You must finish a long rest before you can use this theory on the same creature again.

Shadow Domain.name: Shadow Domain
Shadow Domain.description:
Clerics of the Sacred Flame know that life is at all times a balance between the light and the dark. Most clerics uphold the flame, whose divine purpose is to hold back the darkness, and offer guidance to those who pass on. Clerics of the Shadow Domain are in tune with the dark side of the divine. They stand to balance all things, practicing the powers of shadow against their enemies. They know that not all deserve the light, and so sending foul horrors to the shadows is their form of righteous justice.

Shadow Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7e3QXF10hLNDEdr6], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.KhwiSi9fwVfUPtku]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.aU62xVUBYkAQWIHv]
7th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]
9th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kSPRpeIx3w3nihrF]

Prophetic Foresight.name: Prophetic Foresight
Prophetic Foresight.description:
You can behold glimpses of the most disastrous outcome for every possible action. When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you use your reaction and attempt to make these visions come true. The triggering creature must make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC.

On a failed saving throw, the triggering attack roll misses or the triggering ability check or saving throw fails. On a successful saving throw, the creature makes the attack roll, ability check, or saving throw normally, and you do not expend your use of this ability. You can use this feature a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down). You regain expended uses when you finish a long rest.

save.condition: When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw

Esoteric Theory: Rapid Response.name: Esoteric Theory: Rapid Response
Esoteric Theory: Rapid Response.description: When you cast an apothecary spell that restores hit points to a creature, before or after casting the spell, you can move your speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Esoteric Theory: Corrosive Compound.name: Esoteric Theory: Corrosive Compound
Esoteric Theory: Corrosive Compound.description: When you deal poison damage with your apothecary spells, you can choose to deal half the spell's damage as poison damage and half the spell's damage as acid damage instead.

Groomed for Leadership.name: Groomed for Leadership
Groomed for Leadership.description: You gain proficiency in the History and Persuasion skills if you don't already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

Apothecary Magic.name: Apothecary Magic
Apothecary Magic.description:
Your arcane research has given you facility with spells. Refer to the Core Rules for the general rules of spellcasting and the Spells Listing in this book for the apothecary spell list.

Formula Book. You have a book or collection of notes that you study to prepare your apothecary spells, develop your esoteric theories, and record your occult practices. You may use your formula book as an arcane focus for your apothecary spells. You may describe this book any way you like. Some examples of your book's appearance include:

  • A large leatherbound tome with yellowing pages bound shut with an iron lock
  • A scattered assortment of scribbled notes loosely held together by rope
  • A pristine journal with perfect edges and beautiful penmanship
  • A leather briefcase with two small golden locks
  • A medical bag with surgical symbols on the sides
  • A beat-up satchel slung over one shoulder with vials and bottles poking out of every pocket

If the book is destroyed or lost, you can recreate it using inks and paper during a long rest.

Cantrips. You know three cantrips of your choice from the apothecary spell list. You learn additional apothecary cantrips of your choice at higher levels, as shown in the Cantrips Known column of the Apothecary table.

Elementary Reformulation. Whenever you finish a long rest and consult your formula book, you can replace one apothecary cantrip you know with another cantrip from the apothecary spell list.

Preparing and Casting Spells. The Apothecary table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your apothecary spells of 1st through 5th level. The table also shows what the level of those slots is; all of your spell slots are the same level. To cast one of your apothecary spells of 1st level or higher, you must expend a spell slot. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a short or long rest.

You prepare the list of apothecary spells that are available for you to cast, choosing from the apothecary spell list. When you do so, choose a number of apothecary spells equal to your Intelligence modifier + your apothecary level (minimum of one spell). A spell you prepare must be of a level no higher than what's shown in the Apothecary table's Slot Level column for your level.

For example, if you are a 5th-level apothecary, you have three 3rd-level spell slots. With an Intelligence of 16, your list of prepared spells can include eight spells of 1st, 2nd, or 3rd level, in any combination. To cast the 1st-level spell cure wounds, you must spend one of those slots, and you cast it as a 3rd-level spell. Casting a spell doesn't remove it from your list of prepared spells.

You can change your list of prepared spells when you finish a long rest. Preparing a new list of apothecary spells requires at least 1 minute per spell level for each spell on your list.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your apothecary spells, since you learn your spells through dedicated study and occult knowledge. You use your Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Intelligence modifier when setting the saving throw DC for an apothecary spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

Spell save DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier

Spell attack modifier = your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier

Ritual Casting. You can cast an apothecary spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell prepared.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an arcane focus (see the Adventuring Gear section of the Core Rules) as a spellcasting focus for your apothecary spells.

Already a Monster.name: Already a Monster
Already a Monster.description:
While you are raging, you ignore the Symptoms of any Contamination Levels you have gained, except for a Monstrous Transformation.

Whenever you would suffer a Mutation from contamination, you can roll twice and choose which Mutation you gain.

Orbit: Cosmic Power.name: Orbit: Cosmic Power
Orbit: Cosmic Power.description: Once on your turn when you cast eldritch blast, you can consume one orbiting comet to fire an additional beam.

utility.condition: When you cast Eldritch Blast

Despoiler.name: Despoiler
Despoiler.description: You gain resistance to poison and necrotic damage.

Reshaped Form: Change Appearance.name: Reshaped Form: Change Appearance
Reshaped Form: Change Appearance.description: You transform your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, if any. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your statistics change. You can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same. For example, if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal.

Pack Rat.name: Pack Rat
Pack Rat.description:
Provided you have your hands free, you can retrieve and stow handheld items or weapons on your person as part of the action you use them (including the Attack action).

You have accumulated a collection of miscellaneous gear, which you conceal on your person for emergencies. This gear is kept in a bag, jacket, or backpack that you carry with you. You can retrieve any nonmagical, inanimate item detailed in the Adventuring Gear section of the Core Rules with a value of 25 gp or less and weighing less than 10 pounds. You may use this feature to retrieve a number of items equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

Though otherwise functional, objects retrieved using this feature are visibly worthless junk.

Rapid Evolution.name: Rapid Evolution
Rapid Evolution.description: Whenever you cast a spell which inflicts diseases, you can apply an two additional effects from your mutant strain to one of the targets of the spell, instead of one.

Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision.name: Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision
Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision.description: When you make a weapon attack, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls.

Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision.name: Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision
Esoteric Theory: Anatomical Precision.description: When you make a weapon attack with this weapon, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls.

changes.system.description.value:
Anatomical Precision

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls.

Gifts of the Gods.name: Gifts of the Gods
Gifts of the Gods.description:
The Old Gods have chosen you as their divine weapon, a tool to be used against evil. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you are raging, you can attack three times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
  • You can grapple or shove any creature, regardless of size.

  • You can add your Strength score to the range of all thrown weapons.

  • When you shove a creature, you can push it 10 feet.

Chain Reaction.name: Chain Reaction
Chain Reaction.description: When you cast an apothecary cantrip that normally targets only one creature and deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, the spell can instead target two creatures that are within the spell's range.

Mutant Strain: Coughing Fits.name: Mutant Strain: Coughing Fits
Mutant Strain: Coughing Fits.description: At the start of each of the target's turns, it must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, it is unable to speak until the start of its next turn.

Way of the Arcane Hand.name: Way of the Arcane Hand
Way of the Arcane Hand.description: Monks who practice the Way of the Arcane Hand have trained their bodies and souls to be attuned to the weave of arcane magic. They can harness those cosmic energies and use them to fuel their martial practices. Monks of this tradition, although not mageborn, have gained control over the rawest and most natural forms of power.

advancement.title: Erudite Education: Arcana Proficiency
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill.

Reanimator.name: Reanimator
Reanimator.description:
A Reanimator is the master of life and death. Years spent perfecting their formula to bring the recently dead back, or to construct new life out of discarded flesh and patchwork anatomy, have left most Reanimators in a state constantly riding the lines between genius and madness. A Reanimator's skills at clutching life from the jaws of death make them exquisitely suited for dealing with death, and undeath. Their mad genius is presented with the construction of a creature made from the scrap body parts left behind by their enemies which storms forward into battle on their command.

Reanimator Spells

Reanimator LevelSpell

7th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.VtCXMdyM6mAdIJZb], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.zYbQfFPFHLHlWJ0i]
9th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.AGFMPAmuzwWO6Dfz], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.sU02lQ4LjO1dzcIK]

advancement.title: Reanimated Head: Skill Proficiencies
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in the Arcana and Investigation skills.

Brutal Kills.name: Brutal Kills
Brutal Kills.description:
While you are raging, if you reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can choose to kill them brutally, tearing off limbs, and savaging your enemy. The violent display terrifies those around you.

Any enemies that can see you must make a successful Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for the next minute. The save DC is 8 + your proficiency bonus + your strength modifier.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest you can do so again.

save.condition: While you are raging and reduce a creature to 0 hit points

Mutagenist.name: Mutagenist
Mutagenist.description:
Mutagenists have has researched a serum that they inject to transform into a monstrous form. They use themselves as the conduit for this power and hurl themselves towards their enemies as a hulking abomination. They spend their lives researching and discovering new ways to improve and modify the serum in hopes of becoming the perfect form.

Mutagenist Spells

Mutagenist LevelSpell
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZrTc23tToJ0JpH2h], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-scgd.spells.Item.1ghOJpyACQHvz78S]
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8RTDOt80u8aBv9qx], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9eOZDBImVKxbeOyZ]
